query.sql: select o from AppTree o where 1=1 and ((:wn is null or :wn ='') or lower(o.wn) like concat('%',concat(lower(:wn )),'%')) and ((:code is null or :code ='') or lower(o.code) like concat('%',concat(lower(:code )),'%')) and ((:ct is null or :ct='') or o.ct <= :ct)
query.countsql: select count(o.code) from AppTree o where 1=1 and ((:wn is null or :wn ='') or lower(o.wn) like concat('%',concat(lower(:wn )),'%')) and ((:code is null or :code ='') or lower(o.code) like concat('%',concat(lower(:code )),'%')) and ((:ct is null or :ct='') or o.ct <= :ct)

query.sql: select o from Organization o where 1=1 and ( (:name is null or :name ='') or lower(o.name) like concat('%',concat(lower(:name )),'%')) and ( (:code is null or :code ='') or lower(o.code) like concat(concat(lower(:code )),'%'))
query.countsql: select count(o.id) from Organization o where 1=1 and ( (:name is null or :name ='') or lower(o.name) like concat('%',concat(lower(:name )),'%')) and ( (:code is null or :code ='') or lower(o.code) like concat(concat(lower(:code )),'%'))

query.sql: select o from PostInformation o where 1=1 and ( (:code is null or :code ='') or lower(o.organization.code) like concat(concat(lower(:code )),'%') or o.id=:code) and (o.isleaf.name!='离职') and ( (:name is null or :name ='') or lower(o.person.name) like concat('%',concat(lower(:name )),'%'))
query.countsql: select count(o.id) from PostInformation o where 1=1 and ( (:code is null or :code ='') or lower(o.organization.code) like concat(concat(lower(:code )),'%') or o.id=:code) and (o.isleaf.name!='离职') and ( (:name is null or :name ='') or lower(o.person.name) like concat('%',concat(lower(:name )),'%'))

query.sql: select o from Role o where 1=1 and ((:des is null or :des ='') or lower(o.des) like concat('%',concat(lower(:des )),'%')) and ('abcdefg' in (:ids) or o.name in (:ids))
query.countsql: select count(o.name) from Role o where 1=1 and ((:des is null or :des ='') or lower(o.des) like concat('%',concat(lower(:des )),'%')) and ('abcdefg' in (:ids) or o.name in (:ids))

query.sql: select o from TaskRouter o where (1=1)
query.countsql: select count(o.code) from TaskRouter o where (1=1)

query.sql: select o from LogException o where (1=1) and ((:username is null or :username ='') or lower(o.username) like concat('%',concat(lower(:username )),'%')) and ((:path is null or :path ='') or lower(o.controllermethod) like concat('%',concat(lower(:path )),'%'))
query.countsql: select count(o.id) from LogException o where (1=1) and ((:username is null or :username ='') or lower(o.username) like concat('%',concat(lower(:username )),'%')) and ((:path is null or :path ='') or lower(o.controllermethod) like concat('%',concat(lower(:path )),'%'))

query.sql: select o from Post o where (1=1) and ( (:name is null or :name ='') or lower(o.name) like concat('%',concat(lower(:name )),'%'))
query.countsql: select count(o.id) from Post o where (1=1) and ( (:name is null or :name ='') or lower(o.name) like concat('%',concat(lower(:name )),'%'))

query.sql: select o from Shop o where (1=1) and ( (:name is null or :name ='') or lower(o.name) like concat('%',concat(lower(:name )),'%')) and ( (:code is null or :code ='') or lower(o.code) like concat('%',concat(lower(:code )),'%')) and ( (:superior_code is null or :superior_code ='') or lower(o.superior.name) like concat('%',concat(lower(:superior_code )),'%')) and ('abcdefg' in (:canton_code) or o.canton.code in (:canton_code))
query.countsql: select count(o.id) from Shop o where (1=1) and ( (:name is null or :name ='') or lower(o.name) like concat('%',concat(lower(:name )),'%')) and ( (:code is null or :code ='') or lower(o.code) like concat('%',concat(lower(:code )),'%')) and ( (:superior_code is null or :superior_code ='') or lower(o.superior.name) like concat('%',concat(lower(:superior_code )),'%')) and ('abcdefg' in (:canton_code) or o.canton.code in (:canton_code))
